attributes.action: Waiver the higher rate of tax on a second job
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Why should hard working people pay a higher rate of tax on a second job, i  have to work a 8hr day then go on to work a 4hr job - 5 days and nights a week to make ends meet.
Yet all that happens is i get taxed more !!
It's no wonder there are so many criminals in this country - they have it easy.

reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
